website_summaries.verdict: A solid support that offers comfort and a good fit; but with occasional quality issues.
pros: Users like the snug fit and comfort of this model, and appreciate the hot/cold feature as well as that it it easy to put on and take off
It gets top marks for being well-designed and having long-lasting cold packs
cons: Some users complained of the fabric not holding up well or tearing

customer_reviews.title: A woman with less than a 38 chest may need to be more like a 32
customer_reviews.text: A no return policy on this item. Double checking the small print on might help but even the "legal disclaimer" does not mention that this item can not be returned. A woman with less than a 38 chest may need to be more like a 32.... this product in undersized by way more than the stated dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: brad sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good wrap for a woman
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woman, 145 pounds, 5" 8"" with medium size bones/frame and while I ordered a small, I could not adjust the shoulder wrap so it fit snugly around my arm and shoulder. Thus, I couldn't get the degree of coldness I needed on my ligaments/muscles that were sore/strained. The cold packs that came with the wrap are soft and flexible and stay very cold for 20 minutes or longer so I put a towel on my shoulder and placed one of the cold packs directly on my sore shoulder. However, $60 is a lot to pay for a cold pack. This wrap may fit males fine but I don't think that it's a good option for a woman.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Master Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but the best I've found so far
customer_reviews.text: I have had chronic shoulder problems for a long time and finally had to have joint replacement surgery last January. I used ice and heat packs before the surgery and needed lots of ice for weeks after the surgery. Over the long time of my shoulder problems, I've tried several approaches to securing a wrap to this awkward part of the body. This wrap is the best I've found. It's not perfect, though. It is quite bulky and it can be difficult to position it "just right". Nevertheless, it is the best I've found. The two separate pockets for ice/heat packs is a great design feature and the gel packs that come with it work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Fred K, Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: Unless you 6'6 and 300lbs, it is too big.
customer_reviews.text: Ice packs are great. They hold their cold well. That is the only positive. I am not a small man, I have a 46" chest. The wrap would fit Andre the Giant far better than me. It is enormous, and makes a big cold shell around your shoulder that cools things slightly, but because it fits so poorly there is no contact between the sleeve and your skin, thus the ice pack is too far away to actually do the job. If the fabric wasn't oversized, and the adjustment straps weren't designed to crumple the ice pack.... It is just a poorly designed product all the way around. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: not that adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Yes is it pricey, especially compared to others out on the market. But, I like most of the other products in this line particularly how the hot/cold packs are mostly interchangeable. However, I take issue with the arm hole that is adjustable to a point. I have 18" arms and I find it a tight fit. Instead of the two sides being connected with a velcro strap to connect the sides, this product has a closed hole with stiff neoprene and velcro tighteners.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoulder injuries.
customer_reviews.text: This wrap has been a great help in icing my recent rotator cuff injury. One note, the gel pack covers are thin and one of mine developed a small tear after a few uses. I patched it with duct tape and it hasn't affected performance. As other reviewers noted, for large busted women order the larger size. I wish the packs provided more coverage for the very top of the shoulder, but this is a small complaint. Easy to take on/off and helpful. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: The purchase of this shoulder wrap was an add to the knee wraps which we've had for years. It's interchangable for the left or right shoulder, and really easy to use. These are fabulous products. My husband and I are both very active. The older we get, the more we need to ice to eliminate swelling and discomfort. ActiveWraps make it so easy. We keep the ice packs in the freezer and the wraps in a closet close by. We just pull the ice packs out when we need them, slide them into the pouches of the appropriate wrap, and we can complete our icing in 15 -20 minute. No drippy ziplock bags and wet hand towels.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, effective and simple
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for sure! I have a 44” chest and Large works great. I can still use the arm but not as if there was no shoulder sling on it. Easy to use strap with hook and loop closure. Two adjustment straps help tighten the sling around the shoulder. Effectively reduced inflammation at my rotator cuff, and kept me nearly the entire day with only two 15-20 min uses. I store the whole thing in my freezer to avoid replacement of gel packs. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jimminy Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Instructions to find out what size to order and incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: I never have the opportunity to use it. When I ordered it I followed the measurement instructions it had. But the instructions were incorrect because it instruct you to measure your chest and if it is more than 40" need to order L/XL and that's what I did but it is too big. Now when I tried to exchange it for the smaller one S/M they do not accept it. Not happy about this. I never had any problem returning or exchanging any of my orders with Amazon before.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with excellent service
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Activewraps for about 15 years recommended by my PT. Everything they make is legit top quality. This shoulder wrap is no exception. I read comments about "no exchanges" but that is incorrect information. I have had to exchange a knee wrap because I ordered an incorrect size. From my experience, Activewrap has a great warranty and they have always offered returns/size exchanges. My advice is if you have any issues, to deal with Activewraps directly. A real person will help you....not a call center! I highly recommend this brand!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad B Shales

customer_reviews.title: If you are like me, who had trouble and even stopped using ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, not enough I can say about this product. I have been battling with bicep tendinitis and bursitis in BOTH shoulders for more than 7 months. If you are like me, who had trouble and even stopped using ice altogether because it's super uncomfortable to keep the ice thing in place, look no further, it might be pricey but worth EVERY dime. Now I am back to icing as frequently as possible and it has really helped with the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Cunqueiro

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: The ice/heat packs are great. The wrap is okay. Sometimes it’s uncomfortable to wear. Maybe if I was a man it would be more comfortable? It does it’s job of aligning the packs where it needs to be. If I’m sitting in my bed not moving it works great. If I get up or move my arm it becomes uncomfortable and doesn’t want to stay in place unless I make it really tight and then the straps to keep it on my shoulder makes it uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Steep price, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped me deal with my shoulder injury. I wish it came with four inserts, so I could keep two in the freezer and two out (for when I want to heat them). I'll have to buy two more, so I don't have to thaw the ones I keep frozen. But overall a great product. I like that I can get it on myself.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Did the Job
customer_reviews.text: The Wrap did the job, however the strap that went under the armpit was a bit uncomfortable when you tighten it. But overall is numbed the should and relived the pain for a while. I wished the ice gel stayed a little colder longer and I would have given it 5 stars, but I guess that is why the ice pack gel is reusable. So I will stick with 4 stars. It did the job for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Cloris Nadal

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for shoulder thearpy
customer_reviews.text: Did you just have shoulder surgery? Get injured? This really worked well helping my son recovery from rotator cuff surgery. We used this in the third week. Ice machine for 2 weeks straight and then was able to take this to physical therapy. We purchased 2 extra ice packs so that when one was warm, we switched them out with the extra set in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Schina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't put the cold where it is needed
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use for pain in my biceps muscle on the left arm. The wrap has two pockets for the included two ice packs but the seam between the pockets is right on the biceps muscle so neither cold pack rests right on the muscle. I got around this by putting one ice pack between the wrap and my arm so I can position it where needed but I don't think one should have to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Don Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Only ices about 60% of your shoulder
customer_reviews.text: This wrap doesn’t fully come in contact with the shoulder (as compared to wrapping 2 ice bags to my shoulder with an ace bandage). Thus all of the shoulder doesn’t get iced, only about 60% of it does. I tried adjusting all the straps in various ways but no luck. If the ice bags inserts were thicker and more “pillow-y” instead of thin sheets it might fit better.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Volleyball Players (Outside Hitters) and Strained Shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for relaxing my shoulder after a long day of volleyball! The gel packs are very pliable so there is no stiffness of the packs compared to others I've tried before. The strap around the chest fits me very well, definitely make sure to measure before you buy. The tabs on the shoulder part help to create a custom fit and deliver the cooling/heating action to the right area. Highly recommend, definitely follow the directions of 15 mins on 15 minutes off. I have yet to try the packs for heat but love them for cooling my shoulder. Make sure you wear a shirt while using this, something light like a cotton shirt, just don't go ice/heat pack to skin.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: This product was designed by "patients"
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought too many other bad products, like from CVS. I just had a shoulder repair surgery and used other products to ice. All other products were about the same price, but without help from somebody else you could't use it. Once on it would still slip down the shoulder. This product was designed so the patient can use it without the help of others. It sits on you shoulder and you never have the feeling it might slip. The ice packages are thin and very effective. ++
customer_reviews.author: Roland Pabst

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!!!! Great for icing your shoulder.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust. Can use for either shoulder. Ice packs stay quite cold for around 20 minutes and semi cold for another 10 minutes. I had an issue with one of the packs. Was past Amazons time frame but I contacted ActiveWear directly. Get this. Sent an email at 8pm Sunday night. They responded that night they had a one year warranty and told me a replacement pack would be sent out the next morning for free. Sent me confirmation email Monday morning and I got it by Wednesday. Best customer service. Really stand behind their product. We need more companies like this.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: The item does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.text: The ice/heat packs get really cold and hold it for quite a while although I haven't used them for heat yet. It's a well designed piece and would recommend it. It's a hell of a lot easier and covers more area than traditional ice pack in a towel. As a result it gets the shoulder area really cold.
customer_reviews.author: Imixer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work very well at icing side of shoulder.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty effective on the front/back/top of shoulder. But not that effective at icing the side of shoulder, where my issue is. You can do it, but you have to pretty much hold the pack onto the skin. In that case, why have a fancy wrap? The two velcro straps for tightening around the wrap don’t help with tightening the cuff part. They’d need a different design to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ice pack for shoulder problems
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I am doing physical therapy for my shoulders. The ice packs take up very little room in the freezer. They stay cold for a long time. I can ice one shoulder, then easily switch the strap around and ice the other shoulder. I can prepare meals or do other work around the house while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Fits and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review even though I buy a lot of items, but this ice pack wrap is fabulous. It’s made so well, provides gentle compression, and feels so good when I’m wearing it. I couldn’t wait to show it to my pt. She’s ordering two for family members with joint problems. I ordered it for post surgery because i couldn’t afford that $200 ice machine. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anita W.

customer_reviews.title: No Return Policy on this
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for post-surgery pain relief and it looked like it was going to be the right size. I'm generally a medium in most clothes and even after I measured myself I assumed the small/medium would fit. However, it was way too big. When I went to return it, there's a "No return Policy" on this item. Really?! I wouldn't order this unless you are 100% sure of your size.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: stock ice packs a little funky but...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, I can walk around instead of being stuck to the couch with a make shift towel system. I use my own ice pack from choropractor, (much bigger, covers top of shoulder). You can't use the designed pockets if you choose to do what I did, but it still works great. You can synch it up tight to your body. Very simple slim design, not to bulky, one basic strap, with two adjuster straps to snug things up around arm. I love it...
customer_reviews.author: Shaun K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for post rotator cuff surgery
customer_reviews.text: Just had my second rotator cuff surgery on the same shoulder and this is an amazing pain reliever. I'm no longer stuck sitting for 20 minutes with a traditional ice pack. I can move around and even use it in bed. My physical therapist loves it and is telling his other patients about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kee

customer_reviews.title: NO EXCHANGE POLICY
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU ARE AVERAGE SIZE YOU RUN THE RISK OF POOR OR IMPROPER FIT. SEEMS THERE IS A 50/50 CHANCE THE FIT WONT BE CORRECT. I HAVE A 40 INCH CHEST, NOT LARGE IN THE BICEP ,,,THE SMALL IS UNCOMFORTABLY TIGHT IT WOULD BE REASONABLE TO ALLOW AN EXCHANGE REQUEST WITHIN A DAY OR TWO OF RECEIPT SO A PERSON COULD CHECK THE FIT. THAT BEING SAID I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT TO A PERSON OF AVERAGE BUILD, FIT COULD BE A GAMBLE.
customer_reviews.author: craigster

customer_reviews.title: A must for serious baseball players.
customer_reviews.text: Both of my sons have played baseball throughout high school and we have had experience with sore arms. We have used this product a number of times and it has performed very well. The neoprene is most comfortable and durable. We leave the ice packs in the sleeve and stick the whole thing in the freezer. The sleeve also provides plenty of protection for your skin from the cold gel packs. After repeated use, a tear has appeared near a seam where one of the straps is anchored. Considering how many times we have used this it has held up well and much better than cheaper brands we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the xl shoulder wrap. I got it, it says XL, but it is too small. I, by no stretch of the imagination have muscular shoulder/arms. And it’s not returnable - very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Negative Nancy Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my mom. She has a shoulder injury and is going for surgery soon. She kept complaining about not being able to ice the right spot, so I thought I'd have her give this a shot. She LOVES IT. A little hard for her to get it on, especially by herself, but over all she is happy, and believe me, she is never happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sky k.

customer_reviews.title: This product really works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is great. I am able to use it to ice my shoulder. The way the strap holds the shoulder pack in place is perfect. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: well built and does what is says
customer_reviews.text: I have had it now for a few weeks..it is built well and puts the cold where it is needed. Easy to use ..i have not used the heat just the cold..
customer_reviews.author: Russell J. Stadler

customer_reviews.title: Clever Design
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my granddaughter who is having problems with a rotator cuff - I have this same shoulder wrap which I why I purchased it for her. It is marvelous! Clever design for a difficult place to ice. Really helped my shoulder heal after I had an injury.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vaughey

customer_reviews.title: Intense Icing!
customer_reviews.text: This wrap really holds the ice packs against the shoulder, and because there are front and back packs you get a really nice treatment. Very thoughtfully, you can put the ice packs behind a second layer, so it gives a less intense treatment if desired. Overall, well made and very easily adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cacace

customer_reviews.title: This is great for after surgery
customer_reviews.text: This is great for after surgery . You can adjust it on three different sections ,this allows you to contour to your shoulder and if you need to relieve pressure just adjust it .
customer_reviews.author: Maurizio E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Love this company and their product quality is second to NONE!!!!! I HIGHLY HIGHLY recommend them for pain issues that require heat and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Thurston A Knox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This shoulder wrap fits nice and snug over the shoulder and around the lower arm. For me it ices all the right spots ! Only down fall it's hard to put on by myself as some movement required hurts for me to put on. Otherwise 5 stars !
customer_reviews.author: Jan Casal

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is WAY off
customer_reviews.text: I am not a small man by any means so I ordered the L/XL. This thing is huge! Absolutely useless for me. When I went to process a return so I could buy the S/M size to my surprise this item is not eligible for return. So now I am stuck with a useless product that I paid $40.00. I will not be purchasing another shoulder brace from this vendor. I will seek out other suppliers/products. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for both rotary cuff surgery and then afterwards for a shoulder replacement. It works well to keep the shoulder cold for about 2 hrs. I bought extra ActiveWrap ice packs that fit in the wrap and could swap them up when they got warm.
customer_reviews.author: microscopyproducts

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got this. It really helps. I’m a disc golfer. Before using this, I would get sore after playing to the point that when I played on consecutive days, my shoulder muscles would start to give out barely halfway through the round. After doing the cold therapy for just over a week I can already see results. It helps me recover and no more soreness of weakbess the next day.
customer_reviews.author: David Eddlemon

customer_reviews.title: too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had a total shoulder replacement and had to ice it constantly. It is way too heavy on my body and it's hard to get on. I wanted to return it . I can't use it. Would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: wendy salmoiraghi

customer_reviews.title: I wrote an angry review a short while ago but after watching the video I was able to use it.
customer_reviews.text: The product is not easy to use because finding the long strap hanging down behind oneself requires some effort.e.g. making sure it's long enough before trying to attach it. I did figure it out finally and will use it. Hopefully it will help with a sprained shoulder;.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient for Heat
customer_reviews.text: Warming this product is very annoying. You have to submerge it in hot water in a dish or a bowl before you can microwave it. It’s inconvenient and then when it comes out it’s a wet mess. Once it does come out it’s not very warm and doesn’t stay very warm. Other products are better for heat.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product to anyone recovering from shoulder surgery
customer_reviews.text: I recently had shoulder surgery tore my left bicep and separated my bumper on joint. Got this since it was really sore after working 10 hr days. And man ice therapy is the way to go. I use this everyday I get home from work and it helps out a lot. If u have shoulder pain or recovering from shoulder surgery I'd definitely recommend this product. This was the first suggestion my doctor gave me.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good - but a little too big ans ice packs are hard
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to tell from the descriptions which size to get, so I wound up with one slightly bigger than I would like, However it does the job, because it is somewhat adjustable. I replaced the original ice packs that came in it with ones I got with my hip ice wrap because the new ones were too hard for a shoulder that was sensitive because of surgery. The ones from my hip wrap are more flexible even when frozen, and fit into the shoulder pack just fine. The ones that come with the shoulder pack get rock hard when frozen.
customer_reviews.author: NHTMU

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and value and easy to put on. Great for shoulder injury
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit like it looks in the picture
customer_reviews.text: A 3 star because didn't quite fit right around the shoulder as I expected Make sure to do your measurement correctly. Expect bulkiness towards the top of the shoulder. somewhat bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Good wrap, get the large one though
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit small but gets very cold and warm.
customer_reviews.author: BrucePA-C

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed ice wrap for your shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Really well designed. Fits the shoulder comfortably. You can adjust how much cold you want to apply by moving the ice packs into one of two interior slots. The coldest of the two positions gets very cold! You don't ever have to remove the cold packs if you don't want to. I put the whole sleeve into the freezer. Comes in a nice pouch that you can use to protect the sleeve from touching other things in your freezer. Overall, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Provides great relief for my Tendinitis
customer_reviews.text: Provides great relief for my Tendinitis. I use it every night for an hour before going to bed to get a good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Too big, not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: I got the smaller size and it is way too big, makes my back and neck sore from the strange posture I have to hold to ice with it on. I’m somewhat tall size 6 woman, not a burly guy. And it’s not returnable. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: CMJF

customer_reviews.title: Partially torn rotator cuff loves this wrap.
customer_reviews.text: hubby has struggled with two partially torn rotator cuffs for years. He's finally reinvented his business to give them a break. However, day to day activity still causes flare ups. When it's bad he ices his shoulder with this support and comments that it "hits all the right places."
customer_reviews.author: R. Reed

customer_reviews.title: durable and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I've been using active wrap products for the last 10 years. Starting to buy them as gifts because they are they best for rehab anything!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This really worked well. Hot packs work great. The shoulder harness is well made. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: spork

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to ice down my torn rotator cuff. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to ice down my torn rotator cuff. Stays cold a long time but the two cold packs meet in the middle and do not deliver the cold where I needed it, which was right on the tip of my shoulder. Works ok but not for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for using on your own
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty solid product, especially because other strap/ice pack set ups can be really difficult to set up when you have to put them on by yourself. My small complaint is that the product isn't able to ice every part of the shoulder at once (nor would other ice pack/strap set ups), but you can usually get it to the spot where you need it with some adjustments
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great porduct
customer_reviews.text: Fist great and the ice/heat packs conform to your shoulder. Easy to put on!
customer_reviews.author: D. C

customer_reviews.title: Active Wrap Shoulder Great
customer_reviews.text: I've had shoulder problems since 1983 when I threw a softball early in a cold season from center field to home on the fly. We all pay for our mistakes. I've been through countless shoulder wraps, mainly for the cold, over the past almost 20 years. This particular wrap, while pricy, is the best designed, best constructed, and best built one I have come accross. and the best part is one person can put in on by themsleves with absolutely no help. And it covers almost all the way around your shoulder and arm!! Good job.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Consummer

customer_reviews.title: Needs extra length in the strap
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small-medium size (why not have small, medium, large, extra-large sizes) which would fit better if there were a couple of inches more in the strap. The wrap does provide cold application in the right areas and can be moved around to cover the right areas.
customer_reviews.author: MS Southern

customer_reviews.title: Genius Invention
customer_reviews.text: Genius invention. This has helped me immensely post rotator cuff surgery by providing a lot of targeted relief and support. I use it after each PT session and have noticed a much faster recovery time as I work on regaining my range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Best way to treat shoulder
customer_reviews.text: Hot or cold... this wrap ROCKS.... puts the temp right where you need it... and you aren't stuck where you sit... fit it up and move about your business... while your shoulder is pampered.... used after my shoulder surgery... therapy... etc... highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit. Doesn’t get the ice to my shoulder
customer_reviews.text: I am a small framed woman. This was way too big when I put it on. It’s so hard and uncomfortable I’m not even able to put my arm down. It doesn’t even get the ice to the top of my shoulder. I can only feel ththe ice on the lower part of my arm. Terrible fit. Doesn’t get the ice to my shoulder. Now I can’t even return it. HORRIBLE WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Size issue
customer_reviews.text: It was too big for me. I'm a medium built and this didn't fit right but it was the only size available
customer_reviews.author: america

customer_reviews.title: NO EXCHANGE OR RETURN, runs large
customer_reviews.text: This product runs very large and I was going to return to replace for smaller size and learned that it is NOT returnable or exchangeable. Perhaps I did not do my due diligence upfront but I was a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bachelder

customer_reviews.title: Ice packs work great The sleeve developed a tear on one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ice packs work great The sleeve developed a tear on one of the seams in the first couple of days but we were able to repair it without much problem
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: No return policy even if you ordered right size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered small/medium was shipped large extra large. My daughter is 5’ and weighs 80 lbs. they have a no return policy It is not issuable for my daughter and not exchangeable because of their policies. Seems like it is a good product but can’t verify that
customer_reviews.author: Dan in MO

customer_reviews.title: Love the ice wrap I have bursitis in my right ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the ice wrap I have bursitis in my right shoulder and this is great for icing the area the fit is perfect and snug without being uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: sandra bunch

customer_reviews.title: I have not tried it in hot mode as I have an excellent heating pad
customer_reviews.text: This shoulder wrap is extremely effective in cold mode. I have not tried it in hot mode as I have an excellent heating pad. I heat my should, exercise, then use cold per my Doctor's instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Strickland

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My son said it wasn't cold enough. There are no returns, so might think hard before ordering this system.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I work out and train 5 days a week, so shoulder soreness or injury is always a possibility. The active wrap is excellent for icing your entire shoulder area. It makes icing easy and convenient and is totally adjustable to fit any size person. Can also be used on either shoulder. I have recommended it to a few of my clients too.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well. Ice packs lay primarily around the arm so if you have top shoulder pain, you might want to look at another product. Overall great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy .
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and unable to get arm in while still Imcapacitated from post op. Still sitting in bag company won’t allow return. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: A. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: this I great for me. Tore a rotor in left shoulder and with the packs that come with it I freeze them and use this about three times a day, Lessens pain and is comfortable to wear, I usually leave it on for about 30 minutes, Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Non-returnable without explanation
customer_reviews.text: The active wrap sounds like a great idea but not when it doesn't fit and the company won't let you exchange it for a medium (rather than small) size. Nice try ... too bad, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Good wrap
customer_reviews.text: Tried 3 different shoulder wraps after surgery and this one was by far the best. Still moved around a little while using it, but would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit right
customer_reviews.text: My husband selected this to ice his shoulder after a Reverse Shoulder Replacement. He is a small person and purchased a size small/medium. It was extremely bulky under his arm, and didn't wrap around securely to make it cold on his shoulder. Not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Genimatas

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My man loves this product. He uses after sports and gym.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and allows continued activity.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is adjustable and works well. Stays in place so can work while wearing it if need to. My other one kept falling out of position.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great. great fit. highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I have inflammation in my right shoulder. this product is easy to use, fits great, and gives great mobility to do normal chores while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN S. MENDES

customer_reviews.title: Too large and CANNOT BE RETURNED.
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, but when it arrived, it was too large. I'm 5'4" and weigh 110 . . . just FYI, it's non-returnable. You'd think products that are non-returnable would state that on the product page.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2", 250, broad shoulders and it fits well. I wish the cold packs fit better towards the top of the shoulder, not just the sides. It is made of good construction and I believe it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: HAYDEN

customer_reviews.title: Large size would be too large for most women.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality shoulder sling. So far I’ve been using only with ice packs & very easy to use & it helps my shoulder pain a lot.
customer_reviews.author: STELLA HAN

customer_reviews.title: Helps well with shoulder surgery
customer_reviews.text: Great for after shoulder surgery. The separate pockets and two cold packs sort of miss the top area but can wiggle it a bit since it covers the area snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: really good ice wrap, but size an issue for  me
customer_reviews.text: I have found the smaller size to be very tight and the larger size to be a little loose even when all the velcro is adjusted. Other than that, it is very functional and allows me to do other things around the house while wearing it. The ice packs stay cold a long time and the best part is the gel doesn't shift around like some other ice packs, even as it warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Toxic plastic smell – unusable
customer_reviews.text: I can’t use this item because the overwhelming toxic plastic smell of it makes it impossible. We washed it three times, and it is still toxic. And it says the item is non-returnable??
customer_reviews.author: Holly Ross

customer_reviews.title: Is really work to my shoulder. I love to use it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and feel so good in my ache shoulder!
customer_reviews.author: olivia yabut

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It was awkward fitting and squeezed my biceps. I could not use it. Wouldn't recommend it for post surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great relief
customer_reviews.text: The item delivers ice relief to affected areas. I am trying to figure out how to apply to bursae, but highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Melnick

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good ice/heat pack
customer_reviews.text: Fiance is currently rehabbing a shoulder injury. Active-Wrap delivers again. You get what you pay for folks. This is a very good ice/heat pack.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Groesbeck

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This worked as expected. It is a bit heavy and was a little painful to use when my shoulder was dislocated, but if I sat still and didn't walk around, the pressure was actually beneficial. It holds its icy temperature for a long time. It is well made and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great shoulder ice packs.
customer_reviews.text: Have tried to ice my shoulder with older ice packs nothing compares to how this works. It wraps my shoulder well. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: shoulder wrap fits and works GREAT !!!! had a small issue with one of the packs leaking, but customer service was QUICK to send out a replacement !!
customer_reviews.author: junie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cold wrap. It secures in place so I can do what I need to without being distracted. The ice stays cold just long enough.
customer_reviews.author: S Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for both the shoulders!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for both the shoulders! I have been using this product for few months now. The straps are easy to use and I can easily change from one shoulder to another. The ice pack last about 25 minutes. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Harish Chakravarthy

customer_reviews.title: I HIGHLY recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I have tendonitis in my shoulder and am supposed to alternate heat and ice. I was a little hesitant because of the price but after using it for a few weeks now, I HIGHLY recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This is a HUGE helpl
customer_reviews.text: Torn rotator cuff - the reviews are true, this thing is wonderful! Good quality, great gel inserts, stay cold long time and are comfortable. Buy it :D
customer_reviews.author: Judge Judy of Online Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Ability to adjust fit to help fit my 5'2" frame 135 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: J&E

customer_reviews.title: It really nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Just received it. It really nice and heavy. Didn't use it yet.
customer_reviews.author: brenda lee

customer_reviews.title: No returns?
customer_reviews.text: Wont let me return. Bought it for my mom to use after her surgery, but shes cant move her arem and cant even get this on.
customer_reviews.author: iris gonzalez

product_meta.title: ActiveWrap Shoulder Ice Pack Wrap with Reusable Hot & Cold Packs - Rotator Cuff Ice Therapy - Large/X-Large
feature_bullets: PICK THE CORRECT SIZE - The ActiveWrap ice pack for shoulder comes in 2 sizes: Small/Medium for chest sizes under 40" and Large/X-Large for chest sizes over 40". Larger chested women and men with larger biceps may require Large/X-Large. Fits both left and right shoulder.

PREMIUM CONSTRUCTION, COMFORT & MOBILITY - Shoulder ice wrap is made from soft stretchable medical-grade neoprene for custom fit & comfort. Fully flexible hot or cold gel packs conforms to shoulder while still allowing natural arm movement.

STAYS COLDER LONGER - Leak-proof proprietary flex gel doesn’t migrate inside the pack allowing longer & more consistent therapeutic temperature. ActiveWrap provides the best hot cold therapy support brace for shoulder and rotator cuff therapy.

GREAT VERSATILITY & VALUE - Remains pliable when frozen. Perfect cold packs for arm injuries. Microwave safe for hot packs. Fabric pouch included to protect skin from burns or damage. Non-toxic and latex-free for sensitive skin. Washable and reusable.
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE - ActiveWrap offers free size exchanges or returns and always includes a 1 year warranty. Contact us with any questions.
